plot outline: The story is about Ramakrishna's journey from Tenali to Vijaynagar. Ramakrishna, better known as Tenali Rama, was an honoured poet in the court of King Krishnadevraya. He was famous for his exceptional intelligence, quick decision making and sense of humour.
title: Tenali Rama
plot: The story is about Ramakrishna's journey from Tenali to Vijaynagar. Ramakrishna, better known as _Tenali Rama_ (qv), was an honoured poet in the court of King Krishnadevraya. He was famous for his exceptional intelligence, quick decision making and sense of humour.
